generic.no-pm: :no_entry: 이 명령어는 개인 채팅에서 사용할 수 없다구요!
generic.nan: :no_entry_sign: Whatever you just send, please just add a whole number. :)
generic.no-song-in-queue: :no_entry_sign: 현재 큐에 아무런 노래도 없어요. 한 곡 추가할까요? :musical_note:
generic.no-song-playing: :musical_note: 현재 아무런 노래도 재생되고 있지 않아요!
generic.no-permission: :no_entry_sign: 이 명령어를 사용할 권한이 없으시네요. 권한 `{{- node}}`이 당신에게 부여되면 명령어를 사용할 수 있어요.
generic.no-voice: :no_entry_sign: 이 서버의 어떠한 보이스 채널에도 연결되어 있지 않다구요!
generic.author: 제작자

help.intro: Discord에서 저랑 같이 신나게 놀자구요! (/^▽^)/ select a command category by responding with {{pre}}help number of command to know more:
help.bug: 지원을 받을 수 있는 Discord 채널 링크를 가져옵니다.
help.add: 서버에 저를 추가할 수 있는 링크를 가져옵니다.
help.voice: 당신이 현재 연결하고 있는 보이스 채널에 접속합니다. (일반적인 음악 명령어들도 봇을 보이스 채널에 접속시킵니다.)
help.leave: 현재 연결되어 있는 보이스 채널에서 떠납니다.
help.ping: 봇 간의 핑 속도를 가져옵니다. 보이스 핑이 아님을 유의해주세요.
help.lewd: 뭔가 음탕한 것 같은 이미지를 가져ㅇ... 으음
help.repeat: Plays a song/the queue on Repeat until new ones are added to the queue.
help.fskip: Skips the Current Song/a number of songs/all songs
help.skip: Starts a Voteskip for the current Song, more than 50% of the channel have to vote, then it is skipped.
help.qr: You can remove single songs with their songid, or multiple with `qr startid-stopid`, this would remove all songs starting at the startid and ending at the stopid, or delete multiple ids by seperating them with commas
help.rq: Adds a random Song/a number of songs to the Queue
help.shuffle: Shuffles the queue. Note that at least 3 Songs have to be in the queue for this command to work.
help.stream: Streams the selected Internet radio, you can search for radios or directly add them by appending -u url to the command
help.sinfo: gives you some information about the current server
help.uinfo: gives you some information about yourself/the mentioned User
help.ban: Bans a User and deletes 7 Days of his/her messages
help.rm: removes messages, you can filter for bots, users, commands/responses of rem or just delete up to 100 messages. Filters: -b -> bots| -r -> messages from rem| -u @user -> messages from a certain user| -c -> messages that start with the prefix of rem.
help.noLevelServer: Disables the level system for the entire server, use the command again to re-enable it
help.noPmServer: Disables the pm notifications for the entire server, use the command again to re-enable it
help.noChServer: Disables the pm notifications for the entire server and enables channel notifications instead, use the command again to revert it
help.setPrefix: Sets the prefix of the bot, no spaces/mentions allowed!
help.kona: Searches Konachan for tags and gives back 1 Image, only usable with a configured NSFW Channel or Admin.
help.e621: Searches E621 for tags and gives back 1 Image, only usable with a configured NSFW Channel or Admin.
help.yandere: Searches Yande.re for tags and gives back 1 Image, only usable with a configured NSFW Channel or Admin.
help.gtn: Gives you a random green tea neko comic, only usable with a configured NSFW Channel or Admin.
help.level: Your Level and XP needed for next Level
help.noLevel: disables the level system for you. Use again to enable it again for you.
help.noPm: disables the PM notifications for you. Use again to enable it again for you.
help.pp: Calculates PP for the beatmap with optional accuracy and mods
help.cookie: Gives a cookie to the mentioned user or shows your cookies if no one is mentioned.
help.git: Gives you the github link of Rem
help.roll: Rolls a number between zero and number, if there is no number it will be out of 10
help.8ball: Gives you the Opinion of the magic 8ball to a question
help.garfield: Gives you a random garfield comic
help.cat: Sends you a random cat image
help.hug: Gives you an anime hug gif
help.slap: Gives you an anime slap gif
help.cuddle: Gives you an anime cuddle gif
help.setLang: sets the language, currently supported are {{languages}}
help.talk: If you want to talk with me @mention me with a message :D
help.helpReply: OK, I sent you a list of commands over PM.
help.bot: Gives you information about the current uptime of Rem, voice connections, usercount and guildcount
help.about: Shows you basic information about me, like the library and who made me.
help.sayd: Make Rem say something and delete your cmd
help.ar: Add a role to yourself or a user
help.cr: Create a role or add a role to the bot, -d -> default, -l 2 -> gives the role to the user once he reaches level 2, -s -> make the role self assignable, example -> cr -l 20 rolename, adds a role a user gets with level 20 called rolename
help.lr: Lists all roles that are linked with Rem at the moment
help.rr: Removes a Role from yourself, another user or the server
help.owo: Sends you random OwO What's this memes, which are handpicked by Wolke
help.dere: Search for a dere definition or get a random one
help.love: Gives the mentioned user a love point, add - to reduce the lovepoints of the user by 1
help.apq: adds a playlist to the queue, only supports youtube-playlists and only needs the id. NOT THE LINK.
help.ap: The add permission command, an extensive explanation can be found on the support discord (!w.bug to get the invite)
help.gp: The get permission command, an extensive explanation can be found on the support discord (!w.bug to get the invite)
help.rp: The remove permission command, an extensive explanation can be found on the support discord (!w.bug to get the invite)
help.cry: Feeling sad ? This is the right cmd for you.
help.iblewd: Searches on ibsearch.xxx (same as ibsafe but with nsfw pics too)
help.getNode: Gives you the permission node, category node and category of a command
help.resetPerms: Resets all permissions set until now, use with caution
help.pat: Pat someone who has been a good boy/girl/helicopter

no-level-server.success-enable: Ok I just enabled the level system for this server, type this command again to disable it.

no-pm-server.success-enable: Ok I just enabled pm notifications for this server, type this command again to disable them.

no-channel-server.success-enable: Ok I just enabled pm notifications for this server and disabled the channel notifications, type this command again to revert it.

no-level.success-disable: Ok, I disabled the level system for you, type this command again to enable it.
no-level.success-enable: Ok, I enabled the level system for you, type this command again to disable it.

no-pm.success-disable: Ok I just disabled pm notifications for you, type this command again to enable them.
no-pm.success-enable: Ok I just enabled pm notifications for you, type this command again to disable them.

ap.wrong-node: The permission node `{{- node}}` will not work, as it is not a valid permission node. To get the permission node for a command type `{{- prefix}}getNode command`
ap.target-not-found: I could not find the target {{- target}} for this command
ap.no-allowance-set: You did not tell me if the perm should be allowed or not, add `true` or `false` depending on your choice
ap.missing-args:
The correct syntax for this cmd is `{{-prefix}}ap <node> [-u|-r|-c] [target] <allowed>`
 Example:
```{{-prefix}}ap playlist.* true -> allows all commands of the category playlist in the server
{{-prefix}}ap music.fskip -u @user true -> allows the mentioned user to use {{- prefix}}fskip```

gp.no-cat: I could not find any permissions with the category {{- cat}}
gp.no-perms: You did not add any permissions yet.

rp.success: I successfully removed the permission `{{- node}}` from the **{{- type}}** `{{- id}}`

love.success-remove: **{{- target}}**님의 러브 포인트를 **{{- rep}}**:heart:만큼 없애셨어요. 앞으로 **{{uses}}**번 없앨 수 있어요.
love.error-cd: 하루에 최대 **2** :heart: 러브 포인트만 사용할 수 있어요. 다음 사용 시간 : {{- time}}.
love.self: :broken_heart: 당신 스스로한테 러브 포인트를 줄 수는 없다구요!

reset-perms.nothing-found: You did not set any Permissions yet.
reset-perms.confirmation: Are you sure you want to reset the Permissions ? Type `yes` to reset them and `no` to cancel this command.
reset-perms.success: I just reset all permissions you set.

dere.no-dere: The dere type you searched for does not exist. Here is a list of possible deres:
dere.dandere:
The Dandere (だんデレ) type refers to a character who is often silent and to themselves.
 It may be due to shyness or just because they’re the quiet type.
 However,when alone with the person they are attracted to, they usually come out of their shell and become more loving.
 This word is an abbreviation of Danmari (だんまり) which means silent and Deredere (デレデレ) which means lovey dovey.
dere.deredere:
The Deredere (デレデレ) type refers to a character who is completely kind, happy, and energetic.
 No matter what may happen, they quickly revert to their cheerful self.
 This may be the only character type that doesn’t have any abbreviation with the base Deredere (デレデレ) word, although the definition isn’t simply lovey dovey like the other types.
dere.himedere:
The Himedere (ひめデレ) type refers to a character who wishes to be treated like a princess by the person she loves, even if they aren’t royalty in actuality.
This word is an abbreviation of Hime (ひめ) which means princess and Deredere (デレデレ) which means lovey dovey.
dere.kamidere:
The Kamidere (かみデレ) type refers to a character with a god complex.
 They’re highly arrogant and proud, and aren’t afraid to speak their minds and show everyone how right they are.
 This word is an abbreviation of Kami (かみ) which means God and Deredere (デレデレ) which means lovey dovey.
dere.kuudere:
The Kuudere (クーデレ), sometimes written Coodere or Kūdere, type refers to a character who is often cold, blunt, and cynical.
 They may seem very emotionless on the outside, but on the inside they’re very caring — at least when it comes to the ones they love.
This word is an abbreviation of Cool (クール) and Deredere (デレデレ) which means lovey dovey.
dere.mayadere:
The Mayadere (まやデレ) type refers to a character who is often a dangerous antagonist of a series, but switches sides after falling in love with another character.
 The character may remain deadly and unpredictable for the protagonist or other main character in the Anime or Manga.
dere.oujidere:
The Oujidere (おうじデレ) type refers to a character who wishes to be treated like a prince by the person he loves, even if they aren’t royalty in actuality.
This word is an abbreviation of Ouji (おうじ) which means prince and Deredere (デレデレ) which means lovey dovey.
dere.tsundere:
The Tsundere (ツンデレ) type is possibly one of the most popular or simply most used character types in anime and manga.
 This type refers to a character who treats the one they love poorly. 
Sometimes this is because they started out hating them and eventually loves them as the series goes on, and sometimes it’s because that’s the only way they know how to react.
 An example is if the main character calls a tsundere character cute.
 The tsundere character will get upset and flustered, possibly cause physical harm to the one they love, and then call them stupid.
This word is an abbreviation of Tsuntsun (ツンツン) which means to look away in disgust and Deredere (デレデレ) which means lovey dovey.
dere.undere:
The Undere (ウンデレ) type refers to a character who says yes to pretty much everything the one they love says. 
 They agree as much as possible to become as close as they can to their love interest. 
 This word is an abbreviation of Un (ウン) which is a short way Japanese people say Yes and Deredere (デレデレ) which means lovey dovey.
dere.yandere:
The Yandere (ヤンデレ) type refers to a character who starts out nice and sweet but eventually becomes dark and obsessive over the one they love.
 They become stalkers and use violence on, and possibly even murder, any person who gets close to their love interest — even if they’re too shy to simply speak with that person they have a crush on.
 This word is an abbreviation of Yanderu (やんでる) which means to be mentally or emotionally ill and Deredere (デレデレ) which means lovey dovey.
dere.yangire:
The Yangire (ヤンギレ) type is similar in some ways to Yandere. 
 It is a character who may start out nice and sweet but becomes very aggressive and psychotic.
 However, unlike Yandere, Yangire do not become violent because of they attraction to a character. 
 Instead, they may snap simply because they’re irritated with a character that has nothing to do with their love interest.
 This word is an abbreviation of Yanderu (やんでる) which means to be mentally or emotionally ill and Kire (きれ) which means to cut or snap.
